name: pogo-accounts-management
description: Secure CRUD application for Pokemon GO accounts built with MEAN stack
author: Your Name

scripts.start: npm run prepare && concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
scripts.build: npm run prepare && concurrently "npm run build:server" "npm run build:client"
scripts.test: npm run prepare && concurrently "npm run test:client" "npm run test:server"
scripts.security:fix: cd client && npm audit fix && cd ../server && npm audit fix
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist
